| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1728](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1728 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

An **acid worm** is a monster added in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). It has an acidic spit, but is fairly slow and weak.

## Strategy

They tend to appear in groups moderately early on, so make sure you can take a few splashes of acid.
html:
Acid worm

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
w acid worm
Difficulty 7
Attacks Spit 2d4 acid, Bite 1d4 poison
w acid worm
Difficulty 7
Attacks

Spit 2d4 acid, Bite 1d4 poison

Base level 4
Base experience 52
Speed 9
Base AC 5
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 30
Nutritional value 30
Size Small
Resistances acid, petrification
Resistances conveyed Cures stoning

A acid worm:

  • cannot pick up items.
  • has no limbs.
  • is an animal.
  • has a serpent body.
  • is acidic to eat.
  • is carnivorous.
  • normally appears in small groups.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1728

An acid worm is a monster added in SLASH'EM. It has an acidic spit, but is fairly slow and weak.

Strategy

They tend to appear in groups moderately early on, so make sure you can take a few splashes of acid.

An '''acid worm''' is a monster added in [[SLASH'EM]].  It has an acidic spit, but is fairly slow and weak.
==Strategy==
They tend to appear in groups moderately early on, so make sure you can take a few splashes of acid.

[[Category:SLASH'EM monsters]]
